casebody.data:
Alfred J. PETIT-CLAIR, Jr., Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
CITY OF PERTH AMBOY, Defendant-Respondent. C-951 September Term 2018
082085 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 3, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002049-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
